title: I just want to know why everyone hates Fiora?
body:
Why does everybody hate Fiora?

I LOVED Fiora...

Why did Riot have to ban me from ranked because I was good at Fiora and nerf my main champion? 

I just think that is a low blow and I want my old Fiora back.

I miss her.

The Reworked Fiora is a completely different champ. 

I suggested to make a twin sister champ with the old Fiora skill set to make people like me happy.

Will Riot name the name of the new twin sister Fiora?!

replies.body: Title has nothing to do with what you wrote and asked.
You make me hate Fiora. Because you won't stop trolling as a whiny little bitch.
Because learning to play against a different champion differently takes too much effort versus just crying.
ik this guy is either a little bet special or a troll but what does he mean by "banned from ranked"

PLEASE!  CALL THE NAME OF FIORA'S TWIN SISTER!   FILORA!!!    

CALL HER NAME! 

BRING BACK THE OLD FIORA!

WHY CANT WE HAVE BOTH?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xfQOq2c42KE
Can you stop spamming your shitposts?

I don't hate Flora. 3 reasons.

1. She's squishy during laning and uses mana. With proper leaning strategems I can poke her down then burst her.

2. She's Demacian. I like all Demacian champs.

3. Her voice. I have a weakness for her accent. <3

Everyone who said no isn't much of an optimist and seem like a negative person. They probably also hate Fiora.  Does Riot really hate Fiora that much? It seems like a crime to ruin the First E-Sport like that and just make a champion half what she used to be.

3 reasons why people hate fiora.

1) percentage max health true damage. Nobody likes it on vanye and that ain't no different here.

2) her w. Negates ALL champion damage, cc and if it negates a immobilizing cc such as a stun or root it stuns who ever gets hits.

3) As a result of the prior two things. She's one of the best duelist who when played right has almost no true counter. 

Her only weaknesses are primarily in her team fight capability since she can only target one opponent at a time and has no real defense against cc chaining once her w is down but during the laning phase she is almost unstoppable in the right hands
